other_tests.findings: Sinus tachycardia with nonspecific inferior T-wave abnormalities.
Segmental necrosis in 6 of 12 glomeruli, inflammatory infiltrate including eosinophils, focal destruction of tubules and peritubular capillaries.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Finding of antimyeloperoxidase antibodies; ruled out Goodpasture's syndrome.
